## The Concept First

No system exists in isolation. APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) allow different systems to communicate â€“ your website can display weather data, process payments, or sync with inventory systems.

## Understanding Through Contracts

An API is like a contract between systems. It says: "If you send me this, I'll give you that." Both sides agree on the format, and communication flows.
